attributes.additional_details:
As I sit in my home in Cardiff and watch what is being done to our wildlife I feel helpless but If one person can galvanise enough strength of outrage then maybe an immediate difference can be made.  Even if you are not an animal lover,  this is our planet and our wildlife and it can be stopped
now if we act now and strongly enough.
No reviews,  agendas or plans to be put into force in the future.  It has to be now.
attributes.background: If we allow the Elephant and Rhino population to be wiped out in our lifetime it is unacceptable.  The current enforcement to stop Ivory poaching is not working and something has to be done now.  It can be done but all countries have to act together and it must be done now.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't able to take action on elephant poaching in other countries. 

You could start a new petition asking for the UK Government to work with other countries to help eliminate elephant poaching around the world.
